snippet: A bill banning abortions in Albuquerque after 20 weeks of pregnancy will be on the Nov. 19 ballot.
abstract: Bill banning abortions in Albuquerque after 20 weeks of pregnancy is on November ballot; City Council votes 5 to 4 to put so-called Pain Capable Unborn Child Protection Ordinance to vote.
lead_paragraph: A bill banning abortions in Albuquerque after 20 weeks of pregnancy will be on the Nov. 19 ballot.

headline.main: New Mexico: Abortion Limits on Albuquerque Ballot
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Abortion Curb On City Ballot
